item.title: Across the years 100 miler ✅️ Haven't run a sub 18h 30m 100 miler since 2023. Every once in awhile the stars align. Big thanks to @joshrunadventures @willybonez @hikewithpunisher for all the help! Big thanks to @aravaiparunning for an amazing event. And t

item.title: Lost 5 pounds to start 2026. Burned 13,000 calories. This was my 3rd fastest 100 mile finish. Something I haven't done in three years. Guess the 300 mile week paid off.We started in 2025 and ended in 2026. Across the Years was a blast. #runtok
item.description: Lost 5 pounds to start 2026. Burned 13,000 calories. This was my 3rd fastest 100 mile finish. Something I haven't done in three years. Guess the 300 mile week paid off.We started in 2025 and ended in 2026. Across the Years was a blast. #runtok

item.title: #SolarayPartner I get asked all the time if I ever get sick, if I run when I am sick, and how I keep going year after year. The truth is, when consistency matters, staying healthy matters even more. I have three kids and I work in a firehouse, so I am con

item.title: 2026 Lottery is open from January 3rd-18th, 2026. I know you all follow me for financial advice. So here's some more. Sign up for this lottery. This race will change your life. See you in Moab #Moab240 #runtok

item.title: 100 miles. 71 loops. Two years in one run. Started on December 31st, 2025. Finished on January 1st, 2026. Ran from one year into the next. Ended 2025 strong and started 2026 even stronger. 3rd fastest 100-mile time of my life. The old legs still have some

item.title: Audiobook struggles Couldn't get through this chapter without breaking down. 15 years. My best friend. The one who was there for every low point, every struggle, every 3am run when I couldn't sleep. She got me through everything. And then I had to let her
item.description: Audiobook struggles Couldn't get through this chapter without breaking down. 15 years. My best friend. The one who was there for every low point, every struggle, every 3am run when I couldn't sleep. She got me through everything. And then I had to let her

item.title: My 2026 race calendar just arrived. This thing is massive. All 365 days on one page. Every race. Every goal. The entire year at a glance. Here's what I'm chasing in 2026: ✓ Across the Years 100 (12/31-1/1) - DONE • Coldwater Rumble 100 (1/17) • Vegas 100
item.description: My 2026 race calendar just arrived. This thing is massive. All 365 days on one page. Every race. Every goal. The entire year at a glance. Here's what I'm chasing in 2026: ✓ Across the Years 100 (12/31-1/1) - DONE • Coldwater Rumble 100 (1/17) • Vegas 100

item.title: First time using @ketoneiq in a race and it made a massive difference. I tested it during my 300-mile week and knew it worked. But using it in a 100-miler? Different level. The energy isn't like caffeine or a stimulant. It's fuel. Clean, sustained power t
item.description: First time using @ketoneiq in a race and it made a massive difference. I tested it during my 300-mile week and knew it worked. But using it in a 100-miler? Different level. The energy isn't like caffeine or a stimulant. It's fuel. Clean, sustained power t

item.title: Congratulations @NELKBOYS @Kyle Forgeard on running together for 100 miles while live streaming and raising hundreds of thousands for cancer research. I had a great time crewing and pacing through all the highs and lows. Smile, or you're doing it wrong #

item.title: Top comment on this video is @Eli Wehbe and my next challenge. Vote. 2,900+ votes: "Run 100 miles handcuffed together." So we did. Every 10 miles: @Ketone-IQ Every step: coordinated chaos Every bathroom break: awkward But the fuel? Solid. Clean energy.
item.description: Top comment on this video is @Eli Wehbe and my next challenge. Vote. 2,900+ votes: "Run 100 miles handcuffed together." So we did. Every 10 miles: @Ketone-IQ Every step: coordinated chaos Every bathroom break: awkward But the fuel? Solid. Clean energy.

item.title: If you know a good therapist in the Redlands area who specializes in first responders or PTSD, please drop their name in the comments or DM me. I'm also open to hearing about EMDR or other treatments that have actually worked for you. Behind every "do har

item.title: Quick update on the process (and why it's so hard). First, thank you for all the therapist recommendations. I'm following up on them. This is a worker's compensation case. In California, PTSD is a presumptive condition for firefighters, police, and parame
item.description: Quick update on the process (and why it's so hard). First, thank you for all the therapist recommendations. I'm following up on them. This is a worker's compensation case. In California, PTSD is a presumptive condition for firefighters, police, and parame

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
item.description: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
